name: DefaultNodeProj
description: Setting up the repo - Create new repo on Github - Clone it down, `git clone git@github.com:stolksdorf/sample_proj.git` - Create a new app at Heroku - Add it to your repo, `git remote add heroku git@heroku.com:sample_proj.git` - Pushing to `master` now updates your github repo, pushing to `heroku` deploys your app
